Myles Gillard

Video Game & Software Developer

Building engaging worlds and intuitive software, from concept to code.

About Projects Resume

As a video game and software developer from Sydney with nearly a decade of poduct design and programming experience, I bridge the gap between creative vision and technical execution. My passion lies in the entire development lifecycle, from initial design to final deployment across multiple platforms.

My core technical expertise lies in C# and the .NET framework, complemented by extensive experience in a variety of languages and technologies essential for modern development:

  • Primary Languages: C#, C/C++
  • Web & Scripting: Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Jinja2
  • Engines & Frameworks: .NET, Django, Flask, Unity, Unreal
  • Tools: Git, Perforce, Maya, Blender, Photoshop, GIMP, Krita
  • Platforms: PC, Mobile, Web, VR/AR

Throughout my career, I've thrived on the unique challenges each project presents. This has allowed me to continuously refine my skills, adapt to new pipelines, and excel as a collaborative team member. I am driven by the challenge of creating memorable and engaging experiences for users.

I'm always excited to connect and build the next great thing. Follow my journey and see my latest work on my socials!
